item.title: 7.1 Trackings
item.description: Trackings # To track multiple vehicles do the following: Step 1: Click on Utilities > Trackings Step 2: Way 1: Enter the device name to quickly search for the device you want to find. Way 2: Tick on choose: 1: Monitor all devices. 2: Track 1 or more devices. 3: The results show the device on the map.

item.title: 7.2 Multi - tracking by geofences
item.description: Multi - tracking by geofences # To monitor multiple zones do the following: Step 1: Click on Utilities > Multi - tracking by geofences Step 2: Tick on choose: 1: Monitor all regions. 2: Monitor 1 or more zones. 3: The results show the area on the map. 1. Create new geofence # To create a new geofence click on .

item.title: 7.3 Multi - tracking by landmarks
item.description: Tracking Landmarks # To track multiple points do the following: Step 1: Click on Utilities > Multi - tracking by landmarks Step 2: Tick on choose: 1: Keep track of all scores. 2: Track 1 or more points. 3: Results show points on the map. 1. Create new # To create a new point click on . A dialog box appears, for details, refer to section 1.

item.title: 7.4 Toll fee calculation
item.description: Toll Fee # Toll Fee can be understood as finding the path from the starting point to the end point. How many toll booths will I go to where I go. Each station will have a different fee according to the type of vehicle. The displayed information may not be full of toll stations, only for reference for users to estimate the toll and choose the route of the vehicle.

item.title: 7.5 Map Api Key
item.description: ‚ùó Only authorized accounts can access this section ! Map Api Key # Map Api Key: A utility that provides address data for the account’s map page. To view MAP API in your account do the following: Click on Utilities > Map API Key 1. Create Map Api Key # Step 1: Click Create Map Api Key.
